Financial Advice

If you receive :-

  • Income Support
  • Family Credit
  • Disability Working Allowance
  • Housing Benefit or
  • Council Tax Benefit

you may be able to get financial assistance towards the cost of the funeral.

To obtain advice contact your local Benefits Office; they can arrange an interview for you, or they can send you the claim form SF200 "Assistance with funeral payments".

You can also get advice from your Welfare Rights Officer.
